images.alt_text: AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual for the email campaign, capturing the essence of summer in Italy with bright and sunny visuals of beaches, Italian cuisine, and cultural landmarks.
AI-selected These destination images will highlight specific attractions in Italy, showcasing iconic Italian dishes and cultural sites to engage the audience and inspire travel.
AI-selected These destination images will highlight specific attractions in Italy, showcasing iconic Italian dishes and cultural sites to engage the audience and inspire travel.
AI-selected These destination images will highlight specific attractions in Italy, showcasing iconic Italian dishes and cultural sites to engage the audience and inspire travel.
AI-selected These promotional icons will be used to highlight special offers and discounts within the email, encouraging users to take action.
AI-selected These promotional icons will be used to highlight special offers and discounts within the email, encouraging users to take action.
AI-selected The logo will be placed in the header of the email to reinforce brand identity and trust.
AI-selected The background pattern will enhance the overall aesthetic of the email, making it visually appealing and aligned with the summer theme.

assetRequirements.purpose: main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Italy in summer
assetRequirements.visual_style: vibrant and sunny with elements of Italian culture
assetRequirements.content_context: A picturesque view of Italian beaches, sun, and culinary delights

assetRequirements.visual_style: colorful and lively, highlighting cultural sites
assetRequirements.content_context: Images of historical landmarks and vibrant street scenes in Rome

usageInstructions.placement: Place at top of email as main header image with full width
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Лето в Италии ждет вас!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
emailClientNotes: Large file size may affect loading in some email clients
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual for the email campaign, capturing the essence of summer in Italy with bright and sunny visuals of beaches, Italian cuisine, and cultural landmarks.". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
